name: Need for Speed: Underground (GBA)
description:
Experience the style and speed of the illegal street racing scene in a conveniently condensed package.

Featuring street and drag-racing competitions with upgradeable cars from Mitsubishi, Mazda, Toyota and more, Need for Speed: Underground packs the highlights of the GCN game into a sleek, portable package.

Features

  • Race 20 different licensed cars from major manufacturers such as Honda, Mitsubishi, Toyota, Volkswagen and Nissan
  • Race through cityscapes, dodging traffic and navigating shortcuts
  • Compete in more than 100 street racing, drag racing and drift events
  • Win races and events to earn street cred and cash, then blow it all on hot new cars and parts
  • Impress the crowd and your opponents by tricking out your ride! Customize your car's performance by using hundreds of parts from manufacturers like MOMO and Neuspeed
  • Modify appearance, too, changing rims, stickers, paintjob, spoilers and more
